products.title: TP-Link TL N 300 mbps Wireless Router
products.description: A router is a networking device that forwards data packets between computer networks. Routers perform the traffic directing functions between networks and on the global Internet. Data sent through a network, such as a web page or email, is in the form of data packets.

products.title: Samsung 55-Inch 4K Smart LED TV
products.description: Enjoy stunning 4K picture quality and smart features with this Samsung 55-inch 4K Smart LED TV. It's perfect for movie nights and gaming.

products.title: Sony Noise Cancelling Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in music with Sony's noise-canceling headphones. Enjoy crystal-clear audio quality and block out unwanted background noise.

products.title: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max is the ultimate smartphone with its stunning camera, powerful performance, and impressive battery life. It's a must-have for tech enthusiasts.

products.title: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera
products.description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR camera. It's perfect for beginners and offers a range of creative shooting modes.

products.title: Logitech MX Master 3 Wireless Mouse
products.description: Boost your productivity with the Logitech MX Master 3 wireless mouse. It offers advanced features, ergonomic design, and customizable buttons.

products.title: Dell Inspiron 15 Laptop
products.description: Get work done on the go with the Dell Inspiron 15 laptop. It boasts a powerful processor, ample storage, and a high-resolution display.

products.title: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Enjoy 360-degree sound with the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Bluetooth speaker. It's portable, water-resistant, and perfect for outdoor gatherings.

products.title: Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen)
products.description: Make your home smart with the Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen). It's a voice-controlled smart speaker that can play music, control smart devices, and more.

products.title: Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness and Activity Tracker
products.description: Track your fitness and health with the Fitbit Charge 5. It monitors your heart rate, sleep, and provides insights to help you reach your goals.

products.title: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker
products.description: Cook delicious meals in less time with the Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 electric pressure cooker. It's a versatile kitchen appliance that simplifies cooking.

products.title: GoPro HERO9 Black Action Camera
products.description: Capture incredible action shots with the GoPro HERO9 Black action camera. It features 5K video, 20MP photos, and is rugged and waterproof.

products.title: Sony PlayStation 5 Gaming Console
products.description: Experience the next generation of gaming with the Sony PlayStation 5 gaming console. It offers stunning graphics, fast load times, and a wide range of games.

products.title: Kindle Paperwhite E-Reader
products.description: Enjoy reading your favorite books with the Kindle Paperwhite E-Reader. It features a high-resolution display and is waterproof for worry-free reading.

products.title: Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger
products.description: Stay powered up on the go with the Anker PowerCore 26800 portable charger. It has a high-capacity battery and can charge multiple devices simultaneously.
